title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 606.6 - Vacancies and succession
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 606.6 - Vacancies and succession

State Regulations
A vacancy will be deemed to exist when a delegate cannot
fulfill the responsibilities of the position in accordance with local bylaws or
when elected to the position of president. At such time the alternate shall
succeed as campus representative to the faculty council for the unexpired term. The local faculty shall hold another election in the same manner as the
original to fill the unexpired term of the alternate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
606.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
